problems_addressed.specific_problem: How to generate leads as a new agent
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Network extensively, join local organizations, and ask to be the 'second choice' REALTOR.
Focus on consistent follow-up and providing value to potential clients.
Implement a 36-touch program including calls, newsletters, and client events.

target_avatars.relevance: The episode provides foundational strategies for building a client base.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on networking and consistent follow-up to build your database.

target_avatars.relevance: Josh shares advanced strategies for scaling a real estate business.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Implement a structured follow-up system and focus on client satisfaction to drive referrals.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Can I be your second place REALTOR?
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: It's a unique approach to lead generation that can be immediately applied.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Discover the secret to becoming the go-to backup REALTOR!

clip_worthy_moments.quote: It's not call reluctance, it's value deficiency.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Challenges the common belief about call reluctance and offers a new perspective.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Struggling with call reluctance? Here's the real reason why.

key_tactics.tactic: Ask to be the 'second choice' REALTOR.
key_tactics.context: When networking and meeting potential clients.
To maintain and strengthen client relationships over time.

key_tactics.tactic: Use client events to ease phone call reluctance.
key_tactics.context: Invite clients to events to create a natural reason for follow-up calls.

quotable_insights: If I don't call these people, they have to work with an inferior agent.
Follow up with someone until they buy or die.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: Recommended as a technology partner for real estate agents.

resources_mentioned.name: Modwell
resources_mentioned.context: Used for virtually renovating listings to show potential buyers.

episode_summary: In this episode, Josh Anderson shares his journey from military service to becoming a top 1% real estate producer in Nashville. He discusses the importance of networking, consistent follow-up, and providing value to clients. Josh also highlights his 36-touch program and community involvement as key strategies for maintaining strong client relationships and driving referrals.
